Flask

Greater Mystical Cauldron and Greater Flask of Endless Fathoms are equal.

Food

  1. Famine Evaluator And Snack Table

Rune

  • Battle-Scarred Augment Rune

Enchants

Gear slot Enchant
Weapon Enchant Weapon - Machinist’s Brilliance OR Enchant Weapon - Deadly Navigation OR Enchant Weapon - Quick Navigation.
Rings Whichever stat a) sims the highest and b) takes you closer to the stat ratios above.
Bracers Irrelevant, open world utility enchants. Safe Hearthing is probably a safe bet.
Gloves Irrelevant, open world utility enchants. No recommendation to be made here.

Special Mention Enchant Weapon - Torrent of Elements Is very good for pure single target. However, it does not affect Earthquake, making it lackluster overall.

Gems

Socket one Leviathan’s Eye of Intellect, and put Deadly Lava Lazuli into your remaining sockets.
